definition: mute/muted/a dumb person/to be dumb
(onom.) sound of cawing/sound of infant learning to talk/variant of 呀[ya1]
dumb/mute/hoarse/husky/unexploded (of artillery shell etc)
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
pent-up unspoken grievances/suffering not willingly or possibly spoken of
no choice but to suffer in silence (idiom)/also written 啞巴吃黃蓮|哑巴吃黄莲/(often precedes 有苦說不出|有苦说不出[you3 ku3 shuo1 bu5 chu1])
to be forced to suffer in silence/unable to speak of one's bitter suffering
no choice but to suffer in silence (idiom)/also written 啞巴吃黃連|哑巴吃黄连/(often precedes 有苦說不出|有苦说不出[you3 ku3 shuo1 bu5 chu1])
to be forced to suffer in silence (idiom)/unable to speak of one's bitter suffering/sometimes written 啞子吃黃連，有苦說不出|哑子吃黄连，有苦说不出
pinyin: ya3 ba5 chi1 huang2 lian2 , you3 ku3 shuo1 bu5 chu1
containing_words.word: 啞巴吃黃連，有苦說不出

sentences.english: I'm a mute, and had been communicating with him via pen and paper during the entire checkout process.
sentences.chinese: 我是個啞巴，至始至終都在用紙筆跟他交流。

sentences.english: Most people don't dumb till they start talkin'.
sentences.chinese: 大多數人一開口便成爲啞巴。

sentences.english: The learning effect is obvious to all, there's no lack of dummy English learners.
sentences.chinese: 其效果是有目共睹的，啞巴英語不乏其人。

sentences.english: If love need to be interpretated by words, how do the dumbs fall in love then?
sentences.chinese: 如果愛需要表達，那麼啞巴怎麼談戀愛呢？

sentences.english: Later in his life he hand 3 sons-all were mute.
sentences.chinese: 後來生了三個孩子都是啞巴。

sentences.english: Working with a dumb is obviously difficult.
sentences.chinese: 和啞巴一起工作，明顯是困難的。

sentences.english: Sister is already dumb, and it still fails I eat Coptis?
sentences.chinese: 姐經已係啞巴咗，唔通還得食黃連唔成？

sentences.english: Forgive me a dumb not to tell the truth.
sentences.chinese: 原諒我是個啞巴不會說心裏話。

sentences.english: However, you should not speak at all until those mantles are made completely.
sentences.chinese: 但是在編織完之前你要成爲啞巴，無法說話。

sentences.english: All day loaded dumb, let alone eat, I am afraid, are also more likely than life.
sentences.chinese: 整天裝啞巴，別說是喫飯，恐怕連命也保不住。

sentences.english: If you have not heard off, to really become a "dumb English."
sentences.chinese: 如果聽說關過不了，就真的成了“啞巴英語”。

sentences.english: And dumb, let's have some more dumb.
sentences.chinese: 又啞巴，讓我們有更多的啞口無聲。

sentences.english: However, we English and French students were like mutes .
sentences.chinese: 而我們英法專業的學生一個個像個啞巴。

sentences.english: And I drink coptis, also can't speak the bitterness.
sentences.chinese: 啞巴喫黃連，有苦說不出。

sentences.english: I have paralysed in bed for about ten years, and become to a undoubted dummy.
sentences.chinese: 我已癱瘓在牀數十載，還成了名副其實的啞巴。

sentences.english: Only the dumb envy the talkative.
sentences.chinese: 只有啞巴才妒忌多嘴的人。

definition: offal/mixed entrails/trivial matters
to be made to stand still as a punishment
Shut up!/same as 閉上嘴巴|闭上嘴巴
unpleasant talk/malicious words
to beg forgiveness
rooster/cock/(slang) (Cantonese) to visit a prostitute
impossible/can't be done/no can do/unable to accomplish
to contradict (elders or superiors)
(coll.) old man/(said of an aging husband) my old man
to resign oneself to adversity (idiom); to grin and bear it/to submit meekly to insults, maltreatment, humiliation etc
to open one's mouth (to speak, esp. to make a request)/to gape
to act shamelessly/to refuse to acknowledge that one has lost the game, or made a promise etc/to act dumb/to act as if sth never happened
to order sb about/to use sb
deaf person
in the right and self-confident (idiom); bold and confident with justice on one's side/to have the courage of one's convictions/just and forceful
to fly into a rage out of humiliation/to be ashamed into anger (idiom)
